reviews.review: Отличная игра. ;)

The puzzles have gotten quite a bit more complex than the original P0rtal, and the graphics and gameplay have improved quite a bit as well. I thoroughly enjoyed the hilarious storyline while listening to the most passive aggressive AI robot in video games, and the co-op play was surprisingly challenging.
Very entertaining and lots of easter eggs!
It's Portal there's nothing else to say.
Ótimo jogo, principalmente pelas fases e puzzles novos à medida em que vai zerando o game.
if you want to cry over homicidal robots this is the game for you
Juego que roza la perfeción. Imprecindible
Still a good go to game, the commuity maps keer it fun.

Играйте в портал 2, просто чтоб узнать, в чем глубинный смысл картофеля :3
На мой взгляд, вторая часть ничуть не уступает первой.
This is the best game since Portal 5!
Para mi la mejor saga de juegos de todos los tiempos
Это и в правду шедевр в жанре головоломки. Плюс прикольный мультиплеер.
Una auténtica obra maestra, que supera incluso a la primera entrega. Con una historia muy interesante, un modo cooperativo muy divertido y además con editor de mapas. ¿Qué más se puede pedir?
Space, Space, Wanna go to Space!!! SSSSPPPPAAAACCCCEEE!!!!!!!
got this for 9.99 on summer sale, worth the wait
Un Jeu vraiment énorme =D un underground vraiment génial, un histoire vraiment prenant, une Glados d'enfer Oo The jeu non violent, comme quoi c'est faisable. Ce jeu mérite vraiment son 20/20.

Gra jest niezwykła i bardzo ciekawa, nie ukrywam że zdarzają się błędy przy których można się zdenerwować ( np. chwilowe zawieszenie na barierkach) ale tego typu drobnostkach bardzo dobrze mi się gra.  Portal 2 jest moją ulubioną grą i nie zamierzam jej przestać w nią grać, przy czym polecam ją gorąco każdemy.
Absolutely stunning gameplay!

What can I say that hasn't already been said?  This is one of the best games I've ever played.  The single player campaign is challenging, hillarious, and satisfying.  The multiplayer component takes things to another level, with the greatest coop dynamics I've ever seen in a game.  Finally, the perpetual testing initiative puts the level designer in the players' hands, enabling an infinite possibility of replay potential.  Well worth the purchase!
Потрясная игра с отличным кооперативом.
This is one of the best video games out there. It (and it's predeccesor) are staples of gaming. All gamers should play this!
Purely awesome. Hours of fun and thinking. Story is pulling in like hell.
great game. love that it makes you think and really uses your spacial awareness sometimes.
A classic.
Yep.
Mind Blowing GAME
muito bom e se vc joga com um amigo vc caga de rir
With an amazing story and a cake, What could go wrong!

I tried filling the void in my life with family, friends, religion but those turned out to be dead ends. Then I found Portal 2. Not only does Portal 2 make me a better person, it makes the people around me seem better. 

Unfortunately, Portal 2 also stole my gaming virginity and ruined me for all other games. No matter how many I buy, they never seem to measure up to my one, first, true love.

Seriously, great game, get it.

Best plot, ties in seamlessly with the first game, kept the game interesting. Puzzles were much more complex and took longer to solve. Co-op was great, hilarious to play tricks on your partner, challenge to communicate thoughts and plans. GLaDOS had great dialog, loved the introduction of characters like Wheatley, Caroline, and Cave Johnson. 
Similar to how 'cake' became the running joke of Portal 1, 'potato batteries' and 'combustable lemons' became the running joke of Portal 2. 
Great game. 10/10

This is truly a great game. It's not very difficult, but it is still fun. I didn't think the game would've had as much plot as there was. The plor was actually interesting and funny. I really enjoyed this game and it is absolutely worth thr $5 i payed for it.
Awesome game. Perfect level of difficulty, not rage-quit hard, but not mind-numbingly easy.
Great game. Could play it over and over. Now i'm just waiting for Portal 3
This is an awesome game...play this game......for science...you monster.

It's hard to come up with a word to describe this game correctly.. Charming, flawless, unique, funny, dark. It's got it all. It will bring out all kinds of feels from you, but most importantly, it's just plain fun. It's a complete experience, from the sounds to the music it's all around flawless. Do yourselves a favor and play this game!

This second part of the game is better in every point, has better story and also longer, has better graphics but without losing the style that has the game.

This game includes the cooperative mode that is very fun to play with friends, and also has it's own short story. You can play maps, puzzles created by the community.

Portal and Portal 2 are amazing!!.
yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
Must have in any collection. Played through 3 times and still enjoyable.

it is the best puzzle game on steam

Still one of my favorite game to pick up and play every now and then.  With the workshop, the game never gets old.  If you haven't played Portal 2, you should.

Melhor jogo de 2011, gráficos maravilhosos, história bem amarrada e construida, melhor personagem e melhor jogabilidade. Recomendo a todos, pessoalmente meu jogo favorito.

Mas largo que el primero, y personalmente se me ha hecho mas pesado, unas 6 h la historia principal (tambien tiene campaña cooperativa a 2 jugadores). Juegazo tambien aunque personalmente prefiero el primero
This game is cool! i highly recommend playing portal first. i played this at least 6 times, and 2 more times WITHOUT DYING ONCE.
Great game :D

This game has great gameplay and is endlessly fun. The multiplayer is great to play with friends and is very fun as well (if your friend/random partner in science is not a d!ck). You can also subscribe to other levels in the Portal 2 Workshop, where users have expanded the [various] challenging levels in Portal 2.

Perfecto, obra maestra, realmente un muy buen juego.

-Singleplayer fenomenal, los niveles son muy creativos e historia también.

-Co-op desafiente y entretenido.

-Buenas gráficas y físicas.

-Buen sentido del humor

Que más puedo decir UNA OBRA MAESTRA altamente recomendada vale cada dólar.

10/10

Эта игра - козырь, и атмосфера в ней - козырь, и персонажи - козырь. А геймплей? Геймпл КОЗЫРЬ. Как насчет актеров озвучки?. Да они все козыри. Тут даже есть картошка-козырь и кубик-козырь. Козырная игра.
Very fun co-op. Highy recommend playing grabbing a friend and playing this game.
génial
Melhor jogo de todos!
An incredible game! It really puts you to think. From first to last level you keep being challenged. Very recommended!!
Es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida.
Perfect!

un jeu de réflexion excellent surtout en multi joueur !

Love it to bits. One of the best games i'v ever played
Great game from storyline to the outstanding physics. One of Valves best games

Un casse-tête comme je l'aime, avec des moments drôles et sympas, le jeu est rapide, fluide et beau.
Le concept est assez nouveau et il est à découvrir c'est certain !
Nice game, looks good, nice stroy, good mini games and coop mode. 10/10
Absolutely stunning. It surpases the original in both scope and depth. The expanded universe is a joy to discover.
Amazing game!  Love the plot

10/10... AAAAAAA++++++... 10000/10000. Seriously this is the absolute best puzzle game there is. If your not sure about it.. just throw any negative that your thinking aside and try it.. This is the game I go back and play most out of all the games in my library. Although the hours dont show, I usually play it offline at work. But I've probably got about 2,000 hours at least in this game. I've played it through a few times, played tons of community made maps and mods. This games is absolutely killer. You wont regret it. If you enjoy putting your mind to work, amazing physics, and good graphics. Then get it. Portal 2 has more replay value than any game I have ever seen. I can't recommend this game enough! The voice acting is top notch. GlaDOS is my all time favorite character/villain in a game. Wheatley is funny. The turrets are hilarious. This game has it all. It will have you on the edge of your seat while at the same time have you just completely stumped but when you figure it out you'll feel really stupid as most of the time the solution is something really simple. 

Why are you still reading this? Buy this game right now.
обожаю эту игру

An absolute must have. It's the kind of puzzle game that makes you kick yourself in the ass when you finally figure out how to clear a room.

Still waiting for a Portal 3
im reviewing this for the pillar of community
GET THIS GAME! it is my second favorite game other than halo 3, but only get it if u like puzzles and have a dry sense of humor :D

This game is wonderful.  It's a great single-player game, and the co-op adds so much to it.  The storyline is excellent and the entire game is well polished.  There are a few twists that aren't so surprising, but the ones that are surprising make the others well worth it.  There aren't too many hours of gameplay here, maybe 6-8 hours depending on the level of skill at these kinds of puzzles, but this game is certainly worth playing a second time and even a third time, as well.
HOLES!!!!!!!
Ce jeu est juste génial !

Pra quem gosta de puzzle um jogo recomendadissimo =D
Genius. I love this game

The singleplayer is one of the best of all time. However, having finished it in 6 hours. The game is a bit lackluster if you don't have someone to do co-op with. Fortunately the level designer and community made levels are insanely fun.

Play it!!!

Play it now before you do anything else!!!

11/10

If Portal 2 was a women i would be making mad passionate love to it all night every night
Excellent head scratching fun.  In two player the puzzle is twice the entertainment as you and a friend work out exactly how on earth to get both of you across the level.
Challenging puzzle game, never stops to amaze or bore me.

Very good sequal to the first one. Kept the quality way up there.
Most fun to be had co-op.

Vtipem nabytá Portal 2 opravdu nezklamala :)

--Klady--
+ Vtipní,originalní a nehorázně vtipné dialogy,monology jednoduše texty,mluva hry je velice vtipná
+ Grafika na High Detaily bez lagu na opravdu staré PC sestavě
+ Výborná grafika
+ Pěkný příběh
+ CO-OP
+ Vtipné detaily

--Zápory--

- Opčas se v něákem levelu zaseknete (možnost že jsem zpíše já blbec)






Hodnocení: 11/10

Ah, Portal 2. I'm actually bored now because I beat Singleplayer. But WOW. Great story, great gameplay, *sigh* and cheats. I'm glad it has cheats. This would be impossible for me without cheats. This game is GREAT. I'd rate it 8.5 potatos out of 10.
